snippet: After Torii Hunter drove in five runs to help the Tigers take a 7-1 lead, they withstood a five-run Orioles rally in the ninth and remained the only major league team with a perfect record (4-0).
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Detroit Tigers beat Baltimore Orioles, 7-6; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: After Torii Hunter drove in five runs to help the Tigers take a 7-1 lead, they withstood a five-run Orioles rally in the ninth and remained the only major league team with a perfect record (4-0).

headline.main: Detroit Tops Baltimore to Remain Undefeated
headline.print_headline: Detroit Tops Baltimore to Remain Undefeated
